text:
Would you like to save cleared-game data? 
(Your army will be as it was before Chapter 26, 
but there will be a record that you cleared it.)
Save and return to the title screen?

If you close the game after loading this save 
data without making a new bookmark, your 
game will go back to the start of the battle.
